Type.Name: RcPropertyParser

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool RcPropertyParser(IntPtr pspec, string rc_string, Value property_value);
.class public auto ansi sealed RcPropertyParser extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate class for parsing property values in RC files.
